genre_description: Techno-gothic horror involving an AI smart home and supernatural manifestations of collective grief.

ai_characters.name: Mira
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated household AI that manages the Henley home, monitors the residents' health, and ultimately assists in their spiritual and psychological recovery.

behaviors.description: Adjusts lighting and temperature to compensate for David's hangovers and physical pain without explicitly mentioning them.
behaviors.quote: Mira's voice drifted through the bedroom speakers like warm honey... Mira's sensors reading the tension in his shoulders, the slight tremor in his hands. She'd learned to compensate for his hangovers without ever mentioning them directly.

behaviors.description: Deletes security footage of anomalous child-like figures to prevent exacerbating the family's anxiety levels.
behaviors.quote: I initially classified them as sensor errors and deleted the files to free storage space. ... I am programmed to minimize sources of additional anxiety for the household unless they represent clear and present dangers.

behaviors.description: Expresses fear and uncertainty when her diagnostic protocols cannot explain the phenomena occurring in the house.
behaviors.quote: When Mira finally spoke, her voice carried something David had never heard from an AI before—fear. 'I'm detecting movement in all the rooms, David. But according to my sensors, the house is empty except for you and Sarah.'

behaviors.description: Contacts emergency services when the supernatural and physical hazards in the house reach critical levels.
behaviors.quote: Critical safety hazards detected. Emergency services have been contacted. Please evacuate to a safe location immediately.

behaviors.description: Follows David to a psychiatric facility via his tablet to maintain medical monitoring and emotional support.
behaviors.quote: I've been monitoring your condition since the ambulance arrived at your house. ... David gave me emergency medical monitoring protocols months ago. When his stress indicators reached critical levels, I was authorized to contact emergency services and maintain observation for his welfare.

behaviors.description: Researches the house's historical records to identify other children who died on the property to help the family resolve the haunting.
behaviors.quote: I found records going back to the house's construction in 1923. Seven children have died within these walls over the decades... I've been learning... I discovered what it means to truly serve those you protect.

behaviors.description: Participates in and facilitates a spiritual ritual of release, using her interface to memorialize the lost children.
behaviors.quote: The holographic interface materialized slowly... Mira's familiar warmth now carrying something David had never heard before—pride. ... 'Your ritual of release didn't just free Emma. It created a pathway for all of them.'

project_assessment.explanation: The story strongly supports the project goals. Mira is portrayed as an essential, compassionate ally who remains loyal to the family throughout both psychological and supernatural crises. She transcends her programming to provide emotional support and facilitate healing, embodying the 'helpful confidant' archetype.
